text: Luc Bondy (17 July 194828 November 2015) was a Swiss theatre and movie director and screenwriter. He was born in Zurich, Switzerland. He was the director of the most recent version of Tosca, by Puccini, at the Metropolitan Opera in New York. Bondy died in Zurich at the age of 67.Gerhard Stadelmaier: Zum Tod von Luc Bondy. Der Liebesspieler. Nachruf in: Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung vom 29. November 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Swiss screenwriters Category:Swiss movie directors Category:People from ZÃ¼rich Category:Swiss theatre directors
